DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study to collect information on the safety, especially localized injection site reactions, and efficacy of ORENCIA Subcutaneous Injection 125mg Syringe 1mL in patients with rheumatoid arthritis.
DOC.brief_title: Use-Results Survey for ORENCIAÂ® Subcutaneous Injection 125mg Syringe 1mL
DOC.criteria: Patients who are beginning to receive the treatment with ORENCIA Subcutaneous Injection 125mg Syringe 1mL under the approved indications, dosage, and administration
